name: Uxcore-uploader
body:
### Quick Start

**引入资源**

```html
<script type="text/javascript" src="path/to/jquery.js" />
<script type="text/javascript" src="path/to/uxuploader.js" />
```

**创建对象**
```javascript
import Uploader, {Events, Status} from 'uxuploader';
var up = new Uploader({
    request: {
        name: 'file',
        url: 'http://test.yanbingbing.com/upload.php',
        params: {},
        headers: null,
        withCredentials: false,
        timeout: 0,
        chunkEnable: false
    },
    processThreads: 3,
    autoPending: true,
    queueCapcity: 0,
    multiple: true,
    accept: null,
    sizeLimit: 0,
    preventDuplicate: false
});
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
